sourcesContent:
export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Forever Aloe First® Spray",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 15000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/aloe_first_spray.jpg",
    description: "Spray apaisant et rafraîchissant à l'Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10605",
    stock: 18,
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Aloe Heat Lotion",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 11500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/aloe_heat_lotion.jpg",
    description: "Lotion chauffante thérapeutique à base d'Aloe Vera.",
    code: "10500",
    stock: 22,
  },
];
